Captain Justine Leroy leads the investigation with her deputy Vianney, helped by Paul Mesnil, a former police officer turned restaurateur.

programme.title: Les Ames Perdues
programme.desc: 2014. ''Caesar'', a former forensic photographer working for the Damascus police, reveals thousands of photographs of victims of the Syrian regime, tortured to death. The pictures led to arrest warrants being issued for some of the leading figures of the Bashar al-Assad administration, for crimes against humanity.

programme.title: Fraiche

programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard - EP 20
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: La Cabane A Histoires - EP 19
programme.desc: Four best friends have a secret: after school, they climb up to their hidden tree house. It contains a priceless treasure: books! Each day, the children tell one another stories, travelling to exciting fairy-tale worlds.

programme.title: Sam & Julia - EP 76
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires - EP 5
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Ines, and Isa lead double lives: ordinary young ladies at court, they secretly train to become the best fighters in the kingdom. They are the Three Musketeers! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they thwart plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires - EP 6
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Ines, and Isa lead double lives: ordinary young ladies at court, they secretly train to become the best fighters in the kingdom. They are the Three Musketeers! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they thwart plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant - EP 11
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant - EP 12
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Le Refuge D'audrey - EP 24
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 22
programme.desc: Vic insults her father who grounds her. She escapes thanks to Cindy. Flavie wants to trap the cheats in the chess tournament.

programme.title: Tamia - EP 20
programme.desc: Tamia is a courageous young girl who does nothing without careful thought. She wants to be a mediator between parents and their children, a voice for those without one. Helped by friends Audrey, Sara, Yao and Cheick, she enjoys plenty of adventures, taking her young audience on a veritable journey.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie - EP 4
programme.desc: In Macapa, in the heart of the Amazon, the Francophonie is rooted in an isolated region yet turned toward French Guiana, with which it shares a 730 km border. In Oyapock, we follow Genivale, a tour guide, and a high school student who crosses the river by canoe every day to attend the French high school.

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Vivement Dimanche
programme.desc: On his iconic red sofa, Michel Drucker welcomes and shines the spotlight on the talent of yesterday, today and tomorrow. A main guest talks about their career, their projects and their origins...

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 16
programme.desc: Florentina was 14 years old when the dictator Ceausescu was assassinated. She then discovered new words such as freedom and democracy. Twenty years later, she left for the 'other side of the iron curtain', France, where she has found a land of possibility.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 5
programme.desc: Sophie Jovillard, Jerome Pitorin, Ismael Khelifa and Tiga embark the traveller that lies within each of us for a fabulous breath of fresh air! Ninety minutes filled with new horizons and fascinating encounters around the world, four different ways of seeing a city, a region, a country...

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: La Grande Galerie Francophone
programme.desc: Every week and in public, Ali Baddou and his group of columnists receive French-speaking artists who are at the heart of current events and move the lines. Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La grande galerie francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 5
programme.desc: Warnier finds it impossible to go into prison to give his lessons; Paule decides to accompany him, whether he likes it or not. Inside she meets Julien Ocelot and immediately agrees to handle his defence. Irene gets over her depression and regains custody of her son, Paule is devastated.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 6
programme.desc: Paule, full of sympathy for Julien for the suffering he's been through, allows her feelings to get the better of her. She falls in love with him. Irene tries to make Paule see reason by pointing out that she's suffering from losing custody of Simon.

programme.title: 20h30 Le Dimanche
programme.desc: Film, music, sport, literature, politics... Laurent Delahousse's guests talk about themselves and their lives, their careers and their projects, and discuss the news making the headlines of the day. The programme closes with a live musical performance.

programme.title: Le Vieux Fusil
programme.desc: 1944. Julien Dandieu, a surgeon from Montauban, decides to send his wife and daughter to the country and greater safety. A few days later he discovers that the entire population of the village has been massacred by the Germans. Mad with grief, he sets out to hunt down those responsible.

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: A man swims in the sea. As he advances, memories come flooding back. From early childhood to his adult life, all his memories are connected to water. Some are happy, others glorious or even traumatic...

programme.title: Climat : Des Resistants En Outre-Mer
programme.desc: The overseas territories are home to 90% of France's biodiversity: an invaluable heritage now at risk. From Reunion to the Polynesian islands, from Guiana to the Antilles, local people are raising the alarm and joining forces to propose innovative solutions. A close-up look at this environmental vanguard.

programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Refuges De Montagne - Hiver - EP 4
programme.desc: Easter is one of the busiest periods for the Swiss mountain huts. At the Zapport, there's been no heavy snowfall this year. In the Bernese Highlands, at the Tierbergli refuge, the season is at its height.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 22
programme.desc: From Reunion to the West Indies, via French Guiana and Mayotte, France's overseas territories represent a major geopolitical asset for the country. But economic, social and demographic vulnerabilities are exacerbating local tensions and inequalities with France. A closer look at a complex and contrasting situation.

programme.title: Le Journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 23
programme.desc: Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. Each episode features an iconic guest and a series of special reports, allowing viewers to discover or rediscover France, its young designers, and its chic and trendy hang-outs.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: La Grande Galerie Francophone
programme.desc: Every week and in public, Ali Baddou and his group of columnists receive French-speaking artists who are at the heart of current events and move the lines. Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La grande galerie francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: Littoral, a program meant for those who love the sea, takes you on a trip along Atlantic coastlines, wherever unexpected discoveries, impromptu encounters and intense emotions lead them.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1686
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Interieurs - EP 2
programme.desc: In Hauts-de-France, Anne-Catherine Verwaerde meets the influencers, Lilian and Valentin, in search of the most successful renovations in the region. Asma Salomon, interior designer, steps into creator workshops. Anne Eeckeman is fascinated by the loveliest B&Bs.

programme.title: Nature En Symbiose - EP 1
programme.desc: In Europe, from Norway to Portugal, heathland is often subjected to the onslaught of sea and ocean. A poor, uncultivated land where flora and fauna work together form partnerships to enable each species to survive.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 93
programme.desc: Cooking is a way of building bridges between countries and sharing cultural diversity. Starting with a typical ingredient from the French overseas departments and territories, the chef creates a unique dish.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Interieurs - EP 2
programme.desc: In Hauts-de-France, Anne-Catherine Verwaerde meets the influencers, Lilian and Valentin, in search of the most successful renovations in the region. Asma Salomon, interior designer, steps into creator workshops. Anne Eeckeman is fascinated by the loveliest B&Bs.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: Littoral, a program meant for those who love the sea, takes you on a trip along Atlantic coastlines, wherever unexpected discoveries, impromptu encounters and intense emotions lead them.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 57
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 1
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 14
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 31
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 1
programme.desc: The High Priestess decides to send Pokou to the Bali Komians to undergo seven challenges. King Ossei Toutou sets off to fight the Denkyra who want to invade Kumassi.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 2
programme.desc: On their way to Bali, Aunt Amlan and Pokou are attacked by enemy Komians. The High Priestess informs the members of the council that Kumassi is in danger.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 4
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1687
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Le Journal International
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Meurtres A Amiens
programme.desc: On a canal amidst the ''hortillonnages'', the floating market gardens of Amiens, a lifeless body is found in a Nautilus-shaped fun-fair gondola. Inspector Monet and his assistant Barnier head the investigation. The victim, a seemingly ordinary woman, was apparently threatened ambitious plans for a Jules Verne theme park.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 24
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Les Ames Perdues
programme.desc: 2014. ''Caesar'', a former forensic photographer working for the Damascus police, reveals thousands of photographs of victims of the Syrian regime, tortured to death. The pictures led to arrest warrants being issued for some of the leading figures of the Bashar al-Assad administration, for crimes against humanity.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: Stay tuned as Deutsche Welle (DW), Germany's international broadcaster presents the countrys news, current affairs and showcases its people's life and mentality.

programme.title: Sports Life
programme.desc: Nievevska Torres, 14, is a World School Chess champion from Peru. As she rises through the ranks, her father battles cancer and draws strength from her success. To defend her title, they must raise funds to travel. In the streets of Lima, people pay to play her, while the family sell homemade chocolates bearing her name. Together, they face lifes toughest battles - one chess move at a time.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 4
programme.desc: We sit down with ex-Premier League referee Howard Webb, to talk about his early days as a South Yorkshire policeman to becoming one of the most respected referees in world football. In this candid interview Webb shares stories of his rise through the Premier League ranks, culminating in the honour of refereeing the 2010 FIFA World Cup Final. Along the way, he shares the challenges, pressures, and defining moments of a career spent making the game's toughest calls on the biggest stages.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 20
programme.desc: We sit down with Duncan Ferguson to discuss the fierce, passionate, and often unpredictable career of one of Everton's most legendary figures. From his early days in Scotland to his turbulent arrival in English football, PL Stories focuses on Ferguson's deep bond with the blue half of Merseyside; a connection built on loyalty, grit, and unforgettable moments. Through highs, lows, goals, and red cards, we explore how he became more than just a player to Evertonians...

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 21
programme.desc: We follow the rise of one of Italy's most gifted midfielders and his journey to Premier League stardom at Newcastle United, Sandro Tonali.From his early days at Brescia, where his talent drew comparisons to Italian greats, to his development at AC Milan and eventual move to St. James' Park, we trace Tonali's evolution on and off the pitch.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2010/2011 season.

programme.title: REVIEW - SUN 09 NOV
programme.desc: Review covers all the action from Matchweek 11, kicking off with Spurs versus Man United, West Ham host Burnley, and for the game of the weekend in Man City's head to head clash with Liverpool.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 14
programme.desc: From his family fish stall in the markets of Cuiaba, Brazil to the Premier League - still just 24 years old, Igor Jesus' footballing journey has already taken him to three continents. In this week's Big Interview, we catch up with the Cuiaba native on the banks of Hawton Waters in Nottinghamshire to discuss his youth and rise through the ranks in Brazil, his move to Saudi Arabia before returning to Brazil to lift the Copa Libertadores and now, life in the Premier League with Nottingham Forest.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 24
programme.desc: We head to London to unveil the two newest inductee's into the Premier League Hall of fame. Hosted by Kelly Cates, and with a who's who of footballing royalty in attendance, we go behind the curtain to give you exclusive access to the hottest ticket in town.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 19
programme.desc: We chart the remarkable journey of one of the Premier League's most iconic midfielders, Yaya Toure, from his humble beginnings in Bouake, Ivory Coast, to his rise through European football's elite clubs. We sit down with Toure to discuss his development at ASEC Mimosas, his path playing with the likes of Monaco and Barcelona, and his eventual arrival at Manchester City, where he became a driving force behind the club's transformation into a football powerhouse.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2022/2023 (MNC)
programme.desc: A review of all the best goals, action and drama from Premier League seasons past.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 4
programme.desc: Gabby Agbonlahor sits down for 1-to-11 to reveal his ultimate Aston Villa lineup, made up of the teammates he played alongside. A true one-club man, Gabby reflects on his journey from academy prospect to first-team star, sharing stories of the players who made the biggest impact during his time at Villa Park. His Villa XI is full of character, quality, and claret-and-blue pride.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 13
programme.desc: We catch up with Christian Benteke in Washington, where the powerful Belgian striker now leads the line for D.C. United. From his early days in Belgium to his explosive arrival in the Premier League with Aston Villa, followed by big moves to Liverpool and Crystal Palace, Benteke's journey has been one of raw talent, resilience, and reinvention.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 17
programme.desc: Maya Yoshida quietly became one of the Premier League's most dependable defenders during his years at Southampton, but his influence reached far beyond the pitch. In this episode, we look back at Yoshida's journey from Japan to England's top-flight, his role as a leader for club and country, and the cultural bridge he helped build along the way.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 24
programme.desc: We head to London to unveil the two newest inductee's into the Premier League Hall of fame. Hosted by Kelly Cates, and with a who's who of footballing royalty in attendance, we go behind the curtain to give you exclusive access to the hottest ticket in town.

In this week's Big Interview, we catch up with the Cuiaba native on the banks of Hawton Waters in Nottinghamshire to discuss his youth and rise through the ranks in Brazil, his move to Saudi Arabia before returning to Brazil to lift the Copa Libertadores and now, life in the Premier League with Nottingham Forest.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 10
programme.desc: With 97 Premier League goals for some of the biggest clubs in English football, Emmanuel Adebayor was one of Africa's finest footballers to play on these shores. Now, through his SEA Foundation, Adebayor is making a significant impact off the pitch, providing inspiration and opportunity for people in Togo and across the continent.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 3
programme.desc: Ray Parlour joins Will Perry in the changing room to reveal his 10 favourite Premier League moments. A must-watch for any Arsenal fan and football fan alike, packed full of stories about the club's greatest players, and of course that Invincible winning season.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2011/2012 season.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2011/2012 (MNC)
programme.desc: A review of all the best goals, action and drama from Premier League seasons past.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 20
programme.desc: Manchester City v QPR on the final day of the 2011/12 season will forever be remembered as the most dramatic of finales to a Premier League season. Shaun Wright-Phillips and Joleon Lescott offer the perspective from both sides, with the final day drama at the Etihad set in the context of Manchester City's Run-In and their pursuit of a first Premier League Title.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 7
programme.desc: An evergreen strand that relives classic matches, seasons and moments in the company of those who starred in them.

programme.title: PL GOATS - EP 3
programme.desc: No Australian has made more Premier League appearances than Mark Schwarzer, so who better to decide on the true Australian GOAT from those who have made the journey from Down Under to the Premier League.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 13
programme.desc: The Catch-Up Show is your chance to relive the 'best bits' from across the Premier League week with a compilation of all PLP content and programming.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 6
programme.desc: Nicknamed 'The Entertainers', Kevin Keegan's Newcastle team of the 1995-96 season set the Premier League alight with their confidence and flair that took them agonisingly close to winning their first Premier League title. In this show, we speak to those that were part of that incredible journey and reflect on some of those unforgettable moments that captured hearts and forever changing the club's legacy.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 9
programme.desc: Newcastle United are a team on the rise under Eddie Howe; a manager quietly rewriting the modern history of the club. With exclusive access and interviews from inside St. James' Park, we uncover the transformation Howe has led, from stabilising the team to delivering silverware and reigniting belief on Tyneside. As the Magpies set their sights on even greater heights, we ask just how far he can take this ambitious, resurgent club.

programme.title: Classic Match

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 14
programme.desc: Arsenal legend and Invincible, Robert Pires looks back on his greatest Premier League moments, counting down his top 10 from his unforgettable career in England. From stunning goals to title-winning performances, Pires reflects on the moments that defined his time in the league, sharing personal insights and behind the scenes stories along the way.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 18
programme.desc: Widely regarded as one of the best teams in Premier League history, we speak to the players who formed part of the Arsenal Invincibles of the 2003-04 season and hear about the behind the scenes stories and funny anecdotes from that unforgettable league win. With contributions from Thierry Henry, Patrick Vieira, Dennis Bergkamp, Freddie Ljungberg, Ray Parlour and Martin Keown.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 19
programme.desc: Still the only team in Premier League history to throw away a 12-point lead, Les Ferdinand tells the story of Newcastle's agonising Run-In, where Kevin Keegan's side were pipped to the title by Manchester United.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 4
programme.desc: Marcelo Bielsa brought Premier League football back to Leeds in 2020, following a 16 year exile from the top flight. Amidst the backdrop of a global pandemic, Bielsa's full-throttle tactics made Leeds the story of the season. Stuart Dallas recalls the highlights.

programme.desc: A review of all the best goals, action and drama from Premier League seasons past.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 3
programme.desc: We celebrate the greatest goalscorers in Premier League history; the icons whose instinct, power, and flair have lit up stadiums and etched their names into footballing folklore. From Alan Shearer's relentless consistency to Thierry Henry's elegance, Sergio Aguero's killer instinct to Harry Kane's rise, we relive the moments that defined an era.

programme.title: GOALS OF THE SEASON - 2017/2018 (GB: SALAH)
programme.desc: We take a look back at some of the most spectacular and important goals from previous Premier League seasons.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2017/2018 season.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 18
programme.desc: In 2024/25, AFC Bournemouthsmashed their club record with 56 Premier League points, but less than 20 years earlier, they were drowning in debt and fighting for survival. This is the story of a club that defied the odds, silenced the doubters, and rose to become a certified Premier League contender, with their eyes set on Europe.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 7
programme.desc: Matt Richie and Charlie Daniels are the guests for a special edition of PL Moments which discusses Bournemouth's rise from administration to the Premier League.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 14
programme.desc: From his family fish stall in the markets of Cuiaba, Brazil to the Premier League - still just 24 years old, Igor Jesus' footballing journey has already taken him to three continents. programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 24
programme.desc: We head to London to unveil the two newest inductee's into the Premier League Hall of fame. Hosted by Kelly Cates, and with a who's who of footballing royalty in attendance, we go behind the curtain to give you exclusive access to the hottest ticket in town.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 3
programme.desc: With 208 goals in 491 top flight appearances, Wayne Rooney is widely regarded as one of the best strikers to have played in the League. We sit down with the Englishman to discuss the moments that made him a legend and helped him rightly earn his place in the Premier League Hall of Fame.

programme.title: Classic Match
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2011/2012 season.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 3
programme.desc: With 481 Premier League appearances and five titles - Michael Carrick is a Premier League icon. Carrick sits down with Premier League Moments to look back over his glittering career - from the West Ham youth academy through to being a key figure in Sir Alex's Ferguson's Manchester United side. In addition to his Premier League career, he also reflects on winning the Champions League, Europa League, the FA Cup as well as his international career.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Themba Gorimbo vs. Luke Michael
programme.desc: This episode features Themba 'The Answer' Gorimbo and Luke 'Young Gun' Michael battling for the vacant welterweight championship. Vicious ground and pound ends this fight before the end of Round 1. Bonus coverage includes Sizwe Mnikathi vs. August Kayambala.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Gabriel Martinez vs. Serhiy Dzinziruk
programme.desc: This episode features a bout for the vacant WBC diamond middleweight title, as Sergio Gabriel 'Maravilla' Martinez (46-2, 25 KOs) takes on fellow southpaw Serhiy Dzinziruk, aka 'Dzyna Razor' (37-0. 24 KOs). This fight took place from Foxwoods Resort Casino in Mashantucket, Connecticut, USA, on March 12, 2011. Martinez was the reigning Fighter of the Year coming into the fight and vacated his WBC Middleweight title in order to fight the undefeated former champion Dzinziruk.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Sergio Mora
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing off with Sergio Mora with a highly disputed and controversial decision you will have to see to believe! The two never had a rematch. Also on the card, action from WBC Super Welterweight champ Jermell Charlo.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Kaisei, Ikioi, Goeido and Kakuryu from the Haru basho, 2018.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Men's Forms Championships as well as Girl's Weapons, Synchronized Team Forms and Boy's and Girl's Traditional Weapons.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 2 of 4.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Lovemore N'Dou vs. Paul Malignaggi
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features 'The Black Panther', Lovemore N'dou, (45-8, 30 KOs) defending his IBF Junior Welterweight Title against an upstart Paul 'Magic Man' Malignaggi (22-1, 5 KOs) on June 16, 2007 at the Mohegan Sun Casino in Uncasville, Connecticut, USA.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Tyson Fury vs. Steve Cunningham
programme.desc: This episode features a Heavyweight bout between the unpredictable and unbeaten Tyson Fury as we works his way up the ranks taking on former champ Steve Cunningham, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Martin Rodriguez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Adrien Broner facing Martin Rodriguez for the vacant WBO super featherweight title. Also on the card, action from former welterweight champions Paul Williams and Kermit Cintron.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Tochinoshin, Daieisho, Ichinojo and Kotoshogiku from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior

programme.title: WCCB Otto Wallin vs. Gianluca Mandras
programme.desc: Italian champ Gianluca Mandras (12-4, 5 KOs) battles 26-year-old Swedish southpaw Otto Wallin (17-0, 11 KOs) for the WBA Continental Heavyweight Championship in Wallin's hometown of Sundsvall in the city's premiere professional boxing event. Wallin expects to seize the title, while Mandras plans to spoil Wallin's homecoming celebration at the Sporthallen arena.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 7: Mexico City, Mexico - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Boxing and the Martial Art of Hands with Masters Igancio Nacho" Beristain and Tiburcio Garcia."

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Canelo Alvarez vs. Kermit Cintron
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Canelo Alvarez taking on Kermit Cintron in a bout that helped elevate Alvarez into the light middleweight title picture and take another step towards becoming one of the biggest names in boxing. Also on the card, action from a classic battle between Joel Casamayor and Michael Katsidis for the WBO Lightweight title.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Hakuho, Yutakayama, Kotoshogiku and Abi from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the first ever Judo Grand Prix from Cancun, stop to get to know number 2 ranked fighter in the world Tal Flicker, and show a demonstration on how to execute one of Flicker's favorite submissions.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 4 of 4.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9) - EP 26
programme.desc: Homestay Week kicks off, and the couples face real-world challenges to their relationships.

programme.title: Engaged To Be Murdered
programme.desc: Amanda Finley will stop at nothing to keep her son Jackson from marrying Olivia, who she suspects of being after his money.

programme.title: Crowdsource Murder

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S16) - EP 15

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2) - EP 37

programme.title: Yuri's Winning Recipe (S2) - EP 9

programme.title: Ppang Car Road 2 - EP 4

programme.title: Earth Sweepers - EP 6

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5) - EP 67

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Breaking Out - EP 1

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1) - EP 8

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers
programme.desc: Emmy Award-nominated "Late Night with Seth Meyers," hosted by award-winning writer and performer Seth Meyers, is home to incisive humor, topical jokes and A-list celebrity guests. The series signature "A Closer Look" segment has garnered millions of views and is widely lauded for its tightly written and thoughtful approach to analyzing and satirizing news of the day.

programme.title: Executive Decisions - EP 2
programme.desc: Executive Decisions is a CNBC podcast offering a rare window into the minds of top decision-makers. programme.title: Night Serial Drama Eps. 9
programme.desc: A warm and bittersweet drama based on the internationally beloved manga by Shinzo Keigo. Ikuta Hiroto (Okayama Amane), 29, has no job, no romantic partner, and none of the usual worries about the future. Drawn to his easygoing personality, a local elderly woman gives him a single-story house. He begins living with his 18-year-old cousin Natsumi (Mori Nana), who has just moved to Tokyo from Yamagata. Before long, people carrying quiet burdens begin to gather around him.

programme.title: Destined - EP 20
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant whos suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 6
programme.desc: Po (Leon Lai) worked in an advertising company, but his work was not appreciated. He was upset and quitted his job. He took Yis (Jessica Hester Hsuan) suggestion and become a teacher. There he met Sam (Theresa Lee), the schools social worker. She inspired Po and he decided to become a good teacher. His effort and dedication gradually earned him support and respect from the students and his fellow colleagues.

programme.title: My Sister of Eternal Flower - EP 19
programme.desc: FA LAI-CHU (Charmaine Sheh) is a kindhearted and innocent woman with the IQ of a ten-year-old. When her parents passed away, she shouldered the responsibility for the care of her younger sister and brother.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 7
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

Due to successfully saving Marshal MUNG TAI-TUNG (Tsoi Kwok Hing), he is successively promoted seven grades and becomes a bully calling the shots in Sing Wai Town.

programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 6
programme.desc: Po (Leon Lai) worked in an advertising company, but his work was not appreciated. He was upset and quitted his job. He took Yis (Jessica Hester Hsuan) suggestion and become a teacher. There he met Sam (Theresa Lee), the schools social worker. She inspired Po and he decided to become a good teacher. His effort and dedication gradually earned him support and respect from the students and his fellow colleagues.

programme.title: My Sister of Eternal Flower - EP 19
programme.desc: FA LAI-CHU (Charmaine Sheh) is a kindhearted and innocent woman with the IQ of a ten-year-old. When her parents passed away, she shouldered the responsibility for the care of her younger sister and brother.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 7
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 8
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. programme.title: Learning Curve Of A Warlord, The - EP 30
programme.desc: In the Warlord Era, DIK KEI (Dicky Cheung) is a lowly captain without any ambition. He has been using his crafty ideas and fast-talking to survive the past twenty years. Due to successfully saving Marshal MUNG TAI-TUNG (Tsoi Kwok Hing), he is successively promoted seven grades and becomes a bully calling the shots in Sing Wai Town.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 1
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a Fire master in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHINGs third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Just Love - EP 10
programme.desc: Judge KO HEI MAN (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) and KOT KWOK KWONG (CHAN KAM HUNG, SUNNY) have agreed that MAN will concentrate on her career while KWONG will be taking care of the housework after they get married. Everything is in harmony until KWONGs father discovers MAN and KWONGs pre-marriage written agreement. Their relationship complicates ever since._x000D__x000D_ To make things worse, KWONG breaks the agreement and demands to have his own career.

programme.title: Get On A Flat - EP 6
programme.desc: Rewind to the 2008 financial crisis and supermarket manager Che Chi-ming (Andrew Lam) hurriedly sells his apartment. Who could have known even though Chi-ming has been chasing after property prices for 14 years, he still cannot get on the property ladder once again. A middle class lifestyle is tragically transformed into a "midlife crisis"._x000D__x000D_Chi-mings wife Man Wai (Elena Kong) is obsessed with property ownership. She goes to work as a part-time maid at some luxury home.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 15
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 20
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 21
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: Mother VS Mother
programme.desc: Guan De Xing fell in love with Li Xiao Yun when he was young, but was opposed by his mother and had to marry Zhou Shen Yu. Since then, Li holds a grudge against Zhou. Unfortunately, the son of Guan and Zhou falls in love with Li's daughter, and as the two mothers meet, they start brawling again!

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well Too
programme.desc: Another super comedy directed by Clifton Ko about more farcical couplings, mistaken identities, infidelities, and arranged marriages set in the Sung Dynasty.

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manila's Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: Let's Have a Baby
programme.desc: De Sheng and Wan Jun have been married for years, but are unable to conceive. Wan Jun decides to undergo artificial insemination in the States and finally gets pregnant. She meets her cousin from the States who stays temporarily in their house with them, and De Sheng begins to suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: The Gambling Ghost
programme.desc: Sammo Hung plays three roles: Fatty, Fatty's father and grandfather. Hoping to become rich, hotel staff Fatty dives into gambling with his friend to the dismay of his father. When Fatty hits rock bottom, his grandfather's ghost appears to help him. As Fatty finds out that his grandfather was murdered, he vows to avenge his death.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: The Phantom Lover
programme.desc: In 1926 China, Sung, a talented singer, is deeply in love with To, a sweet innocent girl from a wealthy family. Their love evokes strong disapproval from To's father and bitter jealousy from her designated fiance, a young man chosen by her family. This is a story about a singer and a wealthy girl battling to be together in a traditional community.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the family's gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: Ninth Happiness
programme.desc: A comedy starring many popular movie stars, this is a story about a magistrate and his brothers aiming to introduce sin and romance into the virtuous community of Rainbow Village. As they vie for the affections of a charming young village maiden, conflicts arise, adding a twist to their mischievous endeavours.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon
programme.desc: Inspired by the story of Macau's Casino King Stanley Ho, the movie traces his blood-splattered fight to the top from 1930s to 1960s. In 1941, a young graduate, Benny Ho, flees Hong Kong during the Japanese invasion and heads for Macau. Benny starts as a labourer but rises to the top of the city's casino business with his courage, wisdom and diligence.

programme.title: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: An old lady died after mysteriously falling off a building and her ghost appears to haunt the place. This freaked out the security guards, who invite ghostbuster Leo and his female assistant to help. In the process, Leo finds out that the old lady was killed by her son and daughter in law. To rest her soul, Leo promises to bring the couple to justice.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: As Wudang disciple Zhuo Yi Hang confronts the Demon Palace, he reunites with Lian Ni Shang, the woman who once saved him, and their love reignites. Lian, a disciple of the Demon Palace, endures torment to be with Zhuo but is shattered when he accidentally injures her. A fierce battle between good and evil unfolds!

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: Fanny appears to be an ordinary housewife but is in fact a mahjong expert. Deeply in love with her husband, she loses to a seductive woman, Curvy, both on the mahjong table and in competing for her husband's love. With the help from her mahjong master, Fanny vows to take on Curvy in the Mahjong King tournament!

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: After moving to Hong Kong, illegal immigrant Mang has no choice but to live in cramped quarters with male migrants who abuse her. In order to attain Hong Kong residency and a better life, she agrees to marry a lonely old carpenter. After her marriage, Mang crosses paths again with her ex-lover, and the two develop a passionate affair...

programme.title: My Darling Genie
programme.desc: A genie who is trapped in a Chinese oil umbrella helps an honorable young man and his uncle to deal with a covetous loan shark.

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Hong Kong tycoon Ren Da Kuan takes care of his family that spans four generations, yet his three sons grapple with their own challenges. Everything changes when his daughter returns from studying in France with her friend Roberto. Roberto brings a wave of transformation to the Ren family, sparking new hope and opportunities for all.

programme.title: Don't Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: Man Wanted 3
programme.desc: Street kid Dong idolizes Mongkok triad leader Pu Jun and inadvertently joins his gang. When rival Xi Yang seizes control by illicit means, Pu Jun decides to take him down. At the same time, Pu Jun uncovers Dong as a police undercover and banishes him, but Dong sheds his undercover identity to join Pu Jun to seek revenge against Xi Yang.

programme.title: Painted Faces
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life story of Master Yu Jim Yuen who strives to run his academy in the 1960s, even as the opera culture is declining. Three young men, Sammo Hung, Jackie Chan and Yuen Biao, are determined to train under Master Yu and undergo extremely tough training before they become three of Hong Kong's biggest stars

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well (Extended Version)
programme.desc: In this beloved Hong Kong comedy, the three Chang brothers living with their parents learn that love blossoms with nurture, but withers when taken for granted through haste, deceit, and selfishness. This extended version features an additional shootout scene that was omitted from the original theatrical release during Lunar New Year 2016.

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name by the famous novelist Eileen Chang and directed by the equally acclaimed director Ann Hui, this romance story depicts the challenging relationship between an introverted Shanghai divorcee and a cynical Malaysian playboy during the Japanese invasion of Hong Kong in the 1940s. Will the lovers be together in the end?

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yip's boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victim's sister takes revenge by spiking the rapist's drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jin's pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wife's death.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Everlasting Love
programme.desc: Young intern doctor Eric meets Pei Jun and quickly falls in love with her, unaware that she works as a hostess in a night club. Despite their social differences, can their love story defy the odds and lead to a happily ever after?

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss' son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: The Truth
programme.desc: Orphaned lawyer Raymond Lau once helped clear hooker Lan of murder charges, not knowing that Lan is his mother. When a corrupt cop blackmails Lan with Raymond's identity, she kills him out of desperation. When Raymond is enlisted again to defend Lan, he uncovers the secret that she has been hiding about their relationship for years.

programme.title: A Place To Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: Danger Has Two Faces
programme.desc: Many years ago, Inspector Kam killed an innocent man and decided to resign from the police force. He became a professional killer who disguises as a pet store owner. When his best friend, Bobby begins investigating recent murder cases committed by Kam, he discovers that the mastermind behind these cases is actually his superintendent.

programme.title: Beyond The Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun's warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couple's brothel.

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld King's sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: The Bells Of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: The Story Of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lin's sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: Between Tears And Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The General's henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: The movie depicts Fu Hong Xue fighting against the formidable conspirator Master Yu and seeing through his deception. The brilliantly choreographed fights, glorious settings, superb cinematography and strong casts define this movie as a highpoint in Wu Xia cinema.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, scholar Tian Yu Chuan defends a fisherman's honour but accidentally kills the governor's son, driving him into exile. Pursued to the river's edge, he is rescued by the fisherman's daughter. Amid danger, love blossoms between them, and Tian seals their bond with his family heirloom, the Butterfly Chalice.

programme.title: The Convict Killer
programme.desc: After spending fifteen years in prison on trumped-up charges for drug smuggling, the martial arts master Teng Piao embarks on a journey to take revenge on the person who sets him up - "Black Leopard". Unfortunately for Piao, no one knows the real identity of "Black Leopard", except that there is a black leopard tattoo on his chest.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand worth of silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master "Shadow Whip", he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to "Shadow Whip"?

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become "The Five Shaolin Masters".

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows...

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yen's property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love...

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Yu Lou is betrayed by his wife and eventually killed by her lover, Fung, who is the boss of a martial arts school. Yu Lou's brother, Xiao Lou, knows about his tragic death and is determined to take revenge for him.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: The Emperor orders Feng to find proofs of Master Tian's rebellion in his house. Feng falls in love with Tian's granddaughter and marries her. When he finds the proofs and tries to leave with her, his wife is killed in the fight against Tian. Feng creates the mantis-style martial arts and vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: The Five Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master dispatches his last pupil to track down five ex-students who are each an expert in his own lethal combat style. He fears they will steal the fortune belonging to their clan and tasks his pupil to prevent their attempt.

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They fall into a misunderstanding on the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to get her to act as his fiance so as to drive away two women whom he does not like...

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up. Will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?
